::: {#hero-heading}
# Welcome!

I am Hugo, a life science researcher and R programmer. I hold a PhD
in developmental immunology from Lund Stem Cell Center, Sweden. I combine a strong
understanding of **wet lab** science with a passion for **R programming**. 

I use my *bilingual* skill set to **develop tools**, **explore, visualize** and
**analyze data**, that lie close to the needs and expectations of life science 
researchers. 

On my free time, I follow Swedish politics and as a hobby I try to summarize relevant
topics using a single graph of key data.
:::
